is even scarier. You’re just putting yourself in someone else’s hands. What if you can’t wake up forever?”“Don’t say anything stupid. Then you want me to die and regret it?”The surgery next week was a really important one. As Jennie said, there was a possibility that he would never wake up. In fact, that was the case with every operation he underwent. This time, it was a more difficult and dangerous operation than all the previous surgeries combined. He waited almost four years to get surgery from Dr. Johnson, one of the top five heart surgeons in the United States. The list of patients for surgery is long, and there are even rumors that the patients waiting for him will fill an American city. Peter’s condition wasn’t good enough for surgery yet, but he couldn’t wait any longer. If he missed this opportunity, his turn would be pushed back 20 years, so Peter decided to have surgery.“Why will you die? You will live longer than me After surgery, you’ll get better and come back to school.”“I hope so.”“Hey, that’s a long time ago, would you like to join the party?”“Hmm, … okay.”With that answer, Peter only stared at the bell in front of the door, but didn’t even put a finger on it. In the end, Jennie, who could not bear him, pushed him away and rang the bell without hesitation. The door opened without asking who it was, whether it was because of the party.The moment he stepped inside, Peter froze on the spot. None of the people drinking and having fun were pretending to be someone else. It was only natural that Jennie in her catwoman outfit caught everyone’s attention.“… Jennie. Let’s go.”“No. It’s okay.”Jennie, too, noticed something strange, but insisted on seeing Philip.“Jennie. only you…”“Oh my, who is this? Isn’t that Jennifer Bate?”“What are you doing here?”Peter could tell who the women were talking about. Sandra was a tall, dark-haired woman with dark makeup, Kelly was a blonde, busty, and bad-tempered Barbie doll, and Rachel was the woman next to her who looked like she was poisoning the food her fellow models ate. It was because he heard Jennie talk about them so much it pierced his ears, and that was enough to recognize them at a glance.“I came here by invitation.”“Invite? By whom?”“By Philip.”When Jennie proudly raised her head and said, the girls burst into laughter. The other people around also laughed at Jennie.He had a foreboding of something bad. Peter took Jennie’s hand and whispered quietly to get out.“Why am I leaving? I was invited to a party. Where is Philip?”“Hey, he’s in the backyard pool.”As soon as Sandra finished speaking, Jennie started walking across the living room. Peter quickly followed and grabbed Jennie’s arm.“Jenny, let’s go. I think you better go home.”“You’re like this again.”“I think…”“I didn’t come here to hear your thoughts!”Jennie shouted in a sharp voice. Peter was angry and wanted to go back, but he couldn’t leave Jenny here alone.“Listen to me, Jennie.”“There he is!”Jennie, who found Philip, shook off Peter’s hand and ran away. The courtyard connected to the pool had to go down half a floor. Seeing Jennie running down the stairs, Peter sighed and followed her.“Philip! Philip!”Jennie called his name and ran to the door leading to the backyard. Until then, Peter had only thought of taking her back home.  He didn’t want to embarrass her in front of Philip any more.“Jennie, let’s go back.”“You go.”“Jennie!”“You go, Peter.”Jennie gave her strength to open the door. The door that had been closed moved tightly and opened with a rattling sound.“Phil…!”As Jennie took a step forward calling out his name, something poured down over her head. Peter, who was standing next to her, also had it pour over him.Upon confirming that the two were drenched, Sandra and the crew cheered on the terrace and liked it. People around them also burst into laughter.Peter froze on the spot. The water that fell from above had a sour smell because it was a mixture of all kinds of food and alcohol. When he wiped the food residue off his face with his palm, Peter could see Philip properly.Lying on the bed next to Melinda, he slowly got up from his seat with a look of what the hell was going on. His face, wearing a white shirt and black jeans, was a mixture of perplexity and bewilderment, and a little bit of annoyance as if he didn’t like the commotion.“What’s the matter?”When Philip asked that question, Jennie, who was trembling, said, “It’s me,” and looked at Philip. Philip looked at her with puzzled eyes. Peter immediately understood what that brief glance meant.Philip doesn’t know her. He had no idea how this situation was going.“I, you invited me…”Wearing revealing clothes and wearing ice-cold water, Jennie’s lips trembled. The water smeared the mascara and made her face like something out of a grotesque movie. Still, the people around her looked at her with interest as she continued to stutter to Philip.“I, I mean… ”“I’m sorry, but only invited people can come here. You must have misunderstood something.”Philip kindly explained to Jennie, but with a look of disbelief, she pulled out a wet piece of paper from her pocket and held it out.“I, this…”Philip did not accept the paper, glanced down once before answering.“It’s the first time I’ve seen it.”“… ”“Get me a towel over there.”Someone handed the towels piled up by the pool, and Philip gave them to Jennie. Philip said in a friendly but firm voice to Jennie, who was about to say thank you.“If you run out of towels, you can use more. The bathroom is over there, do you need anything more?”If you don’t need anything, will you leave?No one could not understand these last words. Jennie asked, grabbing the towel and squeezing out her last courage.“You do not know? I keep writing to you on orange stationery…”“I’m sorry. I never saw it.”Having said that, Philip turned around and walked back to where he had been sitting. Friends around asked Philip who these two were, and Philip shrugged and answered.“I don’t know. It’s the first time we’ve both seen each other.”Peter’s body turned red as if blood rushed to his face.Philip;s words were more shocking than when he was covered in dirty clothes. He ran out of the house. Jennie followed and called Peter’s name. Peter was so embarrassed that he almost drowned.To Philip, both Jennie nor Peter were just strangers. He realized how foolish it was for him to be afraid to be recognized.“Peter! Peter!”Jennie grabbed his arm.“There is a misunderstanding. Yes there is a misunderstanding It’s because Philip doesn’t know what kind of letter I wrote yet. If I go and explain the situation, Philip will clear up the misunderstanding and make it clear…”“What misunderstanding?”“What?”“What kind of misunderstanding was there? Do you still think he must have read the letter?”“Then what was the reply, that must have been what Philip wrote to me…”“How do you think Sandra was preparing to pour water on you just in time?”“What? Wait, what do you mean, then Sandra read my letter? It can’t be. Did you write a letter in Korean? Philip obviously replied…”“Does Philip know your name? He doesn’t even know your face. He doesn’t know anything!”Peter cried out loudly in anger that a passerby stopped and looked at him.To Philip, Jennie and even Peter were just uninvited guests, nothing more. No matter what he did, people like him could not belong to his world. In the first place, they were different kinds of human beings.The moment cold water poured down his head, Peter sadly realized the truth. The only thing that came after the realization was shame, and anger at himself.“He doesn’t know. He’s not interested. He was not interested in the first place.”Peter said those words, not knowing if he was saying that to Jennie or himself..“What do you mean by that?”Jennie’s face turned red and she screamed.“What do you know? It was you who wrote the letter. Guess you don’t even know where Philip’s locker is? Isn;t it because you translated it strangely?”“Stop it,” Peter shouted and started walking down the street. Then Jennie persistently followed after him and chastised him.“What did you write in that letter? What did you write?”“I wrote what you wrote.”“Didn’t you say something strange? So Philip got angry… so that’s why. right?”“Please stop!”Peter said, shaking Jennie’s hand.“Wake up Jennifer Bate. Please calm down.”“… ”“Philip doesn’t know you. It has always been, and will always be.”“Why are you saying that?”“How long will you live in a delusion? Please face reality.”It was for Jennie, and Peter poured out all the words he didn’t even mean to say. He hated all this now and was ashamed. He was so angry that he just wanted to disappear from this place.Peter took Jennie’s arm and said firmly.“See? This crappy and stupid looking thing is our reality. They and we cannot be the same.”Peter continued, looking at the mansion that was lit up brilliantly and the sound of music and laughter blended together.“Wake up. Wake up from your dreams.”“Dream?”“Yes. Dream.”“Why can’t I be like them? What do they say? If I were to go to Aunt Spencer’s house, it would be a house like that…”“Aunt Spencer?”When Peter asked with a snort, Jennie’s expression wrinkled wildly.“What about Aunt Spencer?”“Does Aunt Spencer even exist?”Jennie slapped Peter’s cheek. Blood dripped from his nose and wet Peter’s lips. The bitter taste of blood reached the tip of his tongue.“Do you think everything I told you was a lie?”“…”Peter didn’t say anything. It was not that they were all lies, but there was always some exaggeration and lies in her words. Peter did not stand by Jennie’s side, even though he knew that it was the only liberation she had endured through that difficult life.“Then why the hell did you come to this party? If you didn’t believe me in the first place, why would you come to this party? … Ha ha ha ha ha.”She smiled as she brushed her wet hair up. Tears streamed down her smudged face.“Did you follow me to see Philip?”“What?”“You also like Philip, don’t you? So you were secretly writing something else in my letter? Is that so?”Jennie’s mental world was weakened,, and it was so disorganized that it collapsed with the touch of a hand. The only thing that could come out of her was accusations and anger towards the other person.“You were pretending to be helping me and fussing behind me. Right? You hooked up with that piggy Fred too. Even Fred says he goes into heat when he sees you. I saw the soccer punks walking with you and me, and I heard a giggle saying that if they had to go with either of us, they would hit you. Hahaha. Did you deliberately go out and flirt with the Korean group you attend? But Philip doesn’t pay any attention to you, so you’re taking revenge on me like this. Isn’t it?”Peter was at a loss for words. His fingertips trembled at the thought that the person swearing at him, as if possessed by evil, was really the friend he loved.“Shall I go and tell Philip? Tell him you like Philip, and you wrote the whole letter! In fact, it’s all up to you!”Seeing Jennie raising her hands wide and screaming, Peter answered quietly.“Jennie, stop it.”“Why? Are you embarrassed? I’m going to tell him.”Peter knew that Jennie didn’t even know what she was talking about. Still, he couldn’t hold her and pat her. He didn’t want to then. There was no room for that.It was the same hurt and the same hardship, Peter believed.Peter was also just 18 years young.“I don’t want to talk to you anymore.”Peter walked out, leaving Jennie behind. That was the last conversation he had with Jennie.Previous Chapter<All ChaptersNext Chapter>

NaralaraAfter getting off the bus, passing through the alleyway and climbing the slope for a while, Inseop could see his house. When he first bought a house here, he had trouble sleeping because he uncomfortable.Currently, Inseop was realizing how the human body quickly adapts to the environment. Even though he was almost all the way up the slope, he couldn’t breathe. Maybe it was because of Kate, the Mimosa in his arms, that he was walking slowly, taking care not to stress it out. Instead of being out of breath, his steps were heavy.Climbing up to the top of a mountain where no one face. Recognizing Inseop was coming, she raised her hand to greet him.“Where did you go with the flowerpot? Don’t tell me you came out in the middle of the night to repot that.”“…”“I called you on Wooyeon’s arm touched Inseop’s shoulder. Standing as if leaning on his shoulder, Lee Wooyeon continued speaking with a plain face.“I don’t know anything about Mr. Inseop, so that’s really enough to hand over a couple of pages that were the most appropriate among Lee Wooyeon’s complex female relations data he has collected.That would be it.While organizing the clothes to throw away and time.”“What?”“It’s my first time traveling. For the first time since I was born.”He was weak, so school, home, and hospital were everything. He came to Korea to get a job undercover, not for traveling. In fact, even after he came to Korea, he had never been to a park. Strictly speaking, this trip to Hawaii was the first trip he had ever taken.“Is this your first time?”Lee Wooyeon also asked the question as if in disbelief.“I am not feeling well, … … I was almost at home.”It wasn’t something to be proud of, but Inseop’s voice trembled a little as he told his story.“I’ve read it in books, but I’ve always wanted to go to Hawaii someday. … … I’m looking forward to it.”After hesitating whether or not to add the word “expected” at the end, he muttered timidly. Lee Wooyeon replied with a smile.“What are you looking forward to?”Inseop could guess that his mood was relaxed from his loose tone.“Just, like the sea, the beach, the sun.”“You want to go swimming? By the way, did you buy a swimsuit?”“No. I don’t swim.”Because of the surgical scar on his chest, Inseop never even dreamed of wearing a swimsuit.“You’ll go all the way there, but you want to come back without immersing yourself in the water?”“It’s fine to just take a look.”The warm sun, the soft sand, and the foamy sea. It was something everyone thought had nothing to do with them. He didn’t even think about belonging to it. He was satisfied with just looking at it from the side.“If you want something, you have to have it.”“… … .”“Will it become yours just by looking at it?”Choi Inseop replied, “I know,” it. No, he tried hard not to have it.“If you want something, try it. Don’t be stupid.”“Mr. Lee Wooyeon, … … What do you do when you have something you want?”It was a question that suddenly popped into front of a delicious dish.“It depends on what the target is. If I can buy something with money, I will buy it with money, and if that is not possible, I can go and get it.”“… … you’ll just get lost in thought, then looked at Inseop’s back and continued.“I can just bring it to you.”“… … Is that the end?”“You can make them listen. If they don’t listen, just kill them and bring another Inseop, what do you want to do the most when you go to Hawaii?”“Just… … I can look around, I can walk around, ah, that’s right. If I am in the US, the phone bill will be less. There must be a lot of
